1.NPC: Hmm… (Yuri is staring at her tablet, seemingly studying some of the data from the mission)
Hehe~ I'll get you this time… (Yuri looks like she has a sinister look on her face)
La~lala~ (Miko is singing a little happy tune to herself)
(Yuri is whistling a song to herself. It sounds like one of those anime songs that she tried to get you hooked on.)
(Yuri seems to be sketching something while humming a song)
Ugh… why did the power have to go out NOW of all times?

1.Player: Hi, Yuri. What are you up to?

2.NPC: Oh! Hey! I'm just analyzing some of the data from the experiments from the mission. Just trying to see if I can learn any more information with a fresh mind you know? Anyways, are you okay? You cooped yourself up in your room for a while.

3.Player: Yeah, I was just out of it after we finished the mission. I slept a lot to pass the time. Bored mostly. I'm happy to be almost home after everything.

4.NPC: I'm glad you're okay! Do you want some onigiri- I mean, rice balls, I made earlier?

6.NPC: (Yuri hands you one of the rice balls she made earlier)

7.Player: (You bite into it and blink. It's SPICY.)

9.NPC: ...! (Yuri's mouth opens in surprise, before her expression changes to one of realization and horror)

10.NPC: Oh no. Ohmygod. I'm Sorry! I was honestly going to give that one to Won Ki as a prank and I got distracted and totally forgot! You should go wash that down with some milk if it's too spicy!

11.Player: (You note to yourself to check with her next time if she had a prank planned...)

1.Player: Are you planning on trolling Won Ki again?

2.NPC: (She blinks and laughs, smiling innocently) What are you talking about~? I'm not doing anything at all! Just a bit busy with a little crafts project! :)

3.Player: Well. Alright then. Just let me know if you want a hand with anything. I'm down to help out.

5.Player: (Yep. She totally has something planned. I should probably keep out if I don't want to get caught in it myself...)

1.Player: Hey Yuri, did you learn anything from the data you were looking at the other day?

2.NPC: Oh hi! Just a bit! Some of the new drugs and medications definitely sped up the healing process without much cost to the general health of the patient. They probably have a better analysis with the information back home.

4.NPC: By the way, did you say something to Rachel yesterday? She seems… really annoyed.

6.NPC: I'd let her cool down for today then. Unless you really want her to make you lose your mind. You know how much she loves to talk. I wouldn't be surprised if she starts trash talking you if you talk to her right now. Even Won Ki and Johnny are avoiding her. Don't say I didn't warn you.

1.Player: Hey Yuri. Do you know if anyone went anywhere by communications today?

2.NPC: Hm… I think I might have seen Won Ki wandering around earlier? I don't know…?

3.Player: Alright. Thanks for letting me know. (Guess I'll go poke Won Ki, Yuri doesn't seem to have much to offer, it seems like she's off in her own world right now)

1.Player: Hey Yuri. Have you noticed anything weird lately?

2.NPC: Other than the weird amount of incidents with the ship happening? Not really.

3.Player: You thought it was weird too then.

4.NPC: We didn't usually get this many incidents… Maybe we'll be okay though!

1.Player: Yuri? What's wrong? Did the power make you lose important data or something?

2.NPC: Ack! Oh, it's just you. I thought- anyway. No, no, no, it's even worse than that!

3.Player: What problem did the outage cause?

4.NPC: My device didn't charge after I was up all night… so now I can't watch anime! And the power system is still bugging out… so I can't even access my data from any of the ship's terminals! It's horrible!

5.Player: Oh… um… yeah… that does sound horrible. Do you know what's causing the problem?

6.NPC: No, my scans haven't detected anything. It's been forever! My last episode! The cliffhanger! Ugh… maybe we need a hard reset of the entire system and not just our servers here… hmm…

8.NPC: Oh, thank you! Yes, please go to Engineering and reset the ship's entire system there.
